name: Yu-Gi-Oh! Card Deck File
summary: Learn about .YDC files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: YDC files can be found under the profiles\[avatar name] directory of a Yu-Gi-Oh! installation. They may be exported and imported with other Yu-Gi-Oh! installations.

description: File used by Yu-Gi-Oh! Power of Chaos, a fantasy trading card game adapted for computers; contains a card deck that has been created by a game user; allows users to save and load different assortments of card decks for game play.
